name: It's on You
storyline: The game is set in the UK highlighting the knife crime epidemic happening among british youth and the impact on those involved and their families. You play as Curtis that has a potential future in international football, and you will have to make choices that will affect the relationships and the outcomes of characters lives throughout the story.
summary: It's On You is an FMV game in which your choices will affect the outcome of Curtis and those around him. The latter caught between a world of crime and violence, in the wake of a gang taking control of the community and a potential career as an international footballer.
